terms.title: Terms of Use & Privacy Policy â€“ Grocery List
terms.aboutText: This application ('Grocery List') is a personal web application that allows users to create, view, share, edit, and delete grocery lists. The application is developed for personal use and aims to make managing groceries more organized.
terms.adminText: The application is managed by the developer of Grocery List ('Administrator'). For questions, you can contact the email address listed in the application.
dataCollectedList: Password (securely hashed with a cryptographic algorithm)
purposeList: to allow users to log in securely via Laravel Sanctum
to correctly assign shared lists to the right users
to guarantee the operation of the grocery list functionality
to display notifications within the app
No data is sold, shared, or passed on to third parties.
securityList: Passwords are never stored in plain text, but securely hashed using Laravelâ€™s built-in hashing mechanisms (bcrypt/argon2).
Data traffic between frontend (Nuxt) and backend (Laravel Sanctum API) is encrypted via HTTPS.
Only authorized users have access to their own data.
Uploads (such as photos) are securely stored and are only visible to users with access to the relevant list.
photosList: contain personal data of third parties without their consent
terms.photosNote: The Administrator reserves the right to remove content in case of abuse.
terms.sharingText: The application allows you to share lists with other registered users. Only users you explicitly add have access to that list. You can stop sharing or delete the list at any time.
terms.retentionTitle: 8. Retention period and deletion of data
terms.retentionText: Users can delete their account and all associated data at any time. After deletion, all data (lists, products, photos, and shared data) is permanently removed from the database. Only emails already sent via the administratorâ€™s Gmail account cannot be deleted, as they are outside the application.
terms.cookiesText: The application only uses technical cookies or localStorage to retain session information (such as authentication via Sanctum or preferences). No tracking or advertising cookies are used.

terms.rightsNote: For questions, you can contact the administrator via the contact address in the application.
terms.changesText: The administrator may change these terms and privacy policy when the operation of the application changes. For important changes, you will be informed within the application and can accept the new terms again.

info.title: Welcome to Grocery List!
info.subtitle: Your smart assistant for all your groceries.
info.feature1Text: Create an unlimited number of grocery lists for any occasion. Add infinite products and keep everything organized in one place.
info.feature2Text: Easily share your lists with others. Collaborate in real-time and see instantly which groceries are already in the basket. Perfect for households!
info.feature3Text: Add your loyalty cards, receipts, or other important cards to the app. This way, you have everything at hand and never miss out again.
info.feature4Text: The app learns from your habits and provides smart suggestions for products you frequently buy. You'll never forget anything again.
info.feature5Text: All your lists, products, and cards are securely stored on your personal account. Available anytime, anywhere.
info.screensIntro: Here's how it looks while managing lists, adding products and checking items off.
info.screenListPageText: Manage all your lists, mark favorites and share with others.
info.screenItemsOpenText: See at a glance what still needs to be bought.

info.screenAddItemsText: Quickly add products thanks to smart suggestions and streamlined fields.
info.screenMobileText: A user-friendly experience on your phone, with easy navigation and quick access to all features.
info.crossPlatformIntro: Use Grocery List on PC, laptop, tablet (iPad) and phone. The responsive design adapts automatically.
